table.name: crm_group_contact
table.comment: Join table sets membership for 'static' groups. Also used to store 'opt-out' entries for 'query' type groups (status = 'OUT')

field.name: status
field.comment: status of contact relative to membership in group

field.name: pending_date
field.comment: when was contact status for this group set to Pending

field.name: in_date
field.comment: when was contact status for this group set to In

field.name: out_date
field.comment: when was contact status for this group set to Out
